entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Flurries beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
